item.title: Why Are You Interested in Applying for This Job
item.description: Q: can you share with us why you were interested in applying for this job, as well as the skills and expertise that you bring into this position? A: the reason I applied this job is that I have been doing lots of analysis, and experiments in the environmental monitoring and analysis. So I, I’ve been in Canada for over over 12 years, and most of the most of the times I’ve I developed method and validate method for those purposes.
